card.description: Survey of customers in a bubble tea cafe on whether or not they like certain bubble tea combinations.

context.potentialUses: Help make recommendations for what kind of bubble tea a new customer should order.
context.potentialMisuses: Anything other than bubble tea recommendations.

mango jelly.description: Does the bubble tea have mango jelly add-ins?

regular boba.description: Does the bubble tea have regular boba add-ins?

lychee.description: Does the bubble tea have lychee add-ins?

herbal.description: Does the bubble tea have herbal add-ins?

red beans.description: Does the bubble tea have red beans add-ins?

crystal boba.description: Does the bubble tea have crystal boba add-ins?

sea salt cream.description: Does the bubble tea have sea salt cream add-ins?

vanilla.description: Does the bubble tea have vanilla add-ins?

banana.description: Does the bubble tea have banana add-ins?

preference.description: Did you like it or dislike it?
